newsitem.title: JAPAN: Arrest warrant issued for Ajinomoto official - Kyodo.
newsitem.headline: Arrest warrant issued for Ajinomoto official - Kyodo.

text.p: The Tokyo District Court has issued a warrant for police to arrest an official of major food maker Ajinomoto Co Inc on suspicion of providing money to "sokaiya" racketeers in violation of Japan's commercial law, Kyodo news agency reported on Tuesday.
Ajinomoto was not immediately available for comment. Police declined to comment on the report.
The court also declined to comment on the Kyodo report.
Kyodo said police were investigating the company and some sokaiya racketeers on suspicion that Ajinomoto paid them several million yen.
Sokaiya extort money from companies by threatening to disturb shareholders' meetings.
